title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching between perspectives, the CVS repository view's maximized state is lost.
OB: When I switch between perspectives, the CVS repository view, which was previously maximized, is no longer maximized.
EB: The expected behavior is that a view which is maximized should remain maximized even when switching between perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce this bug, follow these steps:
1. Open the software and ensure the CVS repository view is visible.
2. Maximize the CVS repository view.
3. Switch to a different perspective.
4. Observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized, which is unexpected.
